Articles.Content:
Valentina Kerman would like you to know that, aside from being a crack pilot, she is a sophisticated and deep Kerbal, and strongly supports the arts. Especially if the arts consist of several tons of exploding spaceship debris.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eRdszhchFbk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
XD A true work of art!

This was so soothing to watch.

But did not see any

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ATu8QKPBzFU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
, maybe have some thruster attached orthogonally and activated with action groups.
May I suggest:

[Burn Together](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75170-WIP-Plugin-%280-23-5%29-Burn-Together!-Alpha-v4-%284-21-14%29?) 

 Need to see a synchronized performance.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Af6hRxZGhko?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 is not dancing.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-02T18:17:46Z" title="07/02/2015 06:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 2, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**
